title: Troll Pick and Solution
body: Post it on here and quit game. U have no solution for it cuz Riot doesn't care about it

replies.body: Trollpick doesnt exist. People can play any champion on any role.

I can assure you, riot does care about it's player base. But there is no such thing as a troll pick in the rules.

For example, it was not  too long ago that picking nautilus or sion support was an extreme troll pick... until people realized hey... it works.

And yes, while you can counter and say. well what about something like, sona jungle or support evelynn. Something that has a high chance of just no success at all.  Its important to realize there is not rule against it. Because out there, there is probably someone who could actually pull it off.

As far as riot can control... no champion can NOT be played in any role. They do this to allow freedom to the players.
